com.varmateo.yawg.spi

Interface PageContext


  • public interface PageContext
    Information to be used by a baker when baking a file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String bakeId()
      Randomly generated unique bake identifier.
      String dirUrl()
      The URL of the directory containing the current page relative to the top of the document tree.
      PageVars pageVars()
      Additional variables made available to the template.
      String rootRelativeUrl()
      The URL of the top of the baked site relative to the current page.
      Optional<Template> templateFor(Path path)
      Template to be used when generating the target page.

    • Method Detail

      • dirUrl

        String dirUrl()
        The URL of the directory containing the current page relative to the top of the document tree.

      • templateFor

        Optional<Template> templateFor(Path path)
        Template to be used when generating the target page.

      • pageVars

        PageVars pageVars()
        Additional variables made available to the template.

      • rootRelativeUrl

        String rootRelativeUrl()
        The URL of the top of the baked site relative to the current page. Useful for refering to resources at the top of the document tree.

      • bakeId

        String bakeId()
        Randomly generated unique bake identifier. Each bake will have a different identifier.
